about_the_game:
Perfect for a cloudy and rainy afternoon, Face It - The Original Game REDUX is a short and (bitter)sweet one level game about finding inner PEACE in a world surrounded by fear, pain and depression.
Featuring an experimental level with minimalistic graphics, this DLC is an improved version of the first attempt to create FACE IT, made in 2014 during the Global Game Jam, following the theme "We don't see things as they are, we see things as we are."

ENJOY minimalistic graphics in a introspective experience
BANISH your fears and doubts with the power of your inner light
DISCOVER the original idea behind Face It - A Game to Fight Inner Demons
PROVE that you have what it takes to get to the end of a brutal level without checkpoints

Featuring an experimental level with minimalistic graphics, this DLC is an improved version of the first attempt to create FACE IT, made in 2014 during the Global Game Jam, following the theme "We don't see things as they are, we see things as we are."

ENJOY minimalistic graphics in a introspective experience
BANISH your fears and doubts with the power of your inner light

fullgame.name: Face It - A game to fight inner demons

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux 14.04
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or better
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550Ti or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550Ti or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic sound card
